message: Let's start off fair, Bob. I believe this split reflects our positions in the game.
I understand you want to start fair, Alice.  How about we split a little closer to the middle? This accounts for the time value of money.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob, but time is running out.  This offer is generous considering the inflation.
Alice, let's be reasonable. We're losing money with every passing round. This offer is fair and gives us both a good deal.
This is my final offer, Bob. We both need to agree if we want to walk away with anything substantial.
